api_list.api_description: Get the latest measurements of all sensors of the specified senseBox.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Number of measurements to be retrieved for every sensor.

query: I want to know the most recent environmental measurements for a senseBox 57000b8745fd40c8196ad04c. Also, can you provide me with a graphical weather forecast for a location at 113.17 longitude and 23.09 latitude?
